system.effect: A solid blow to the chest pulverises the target's innards, and he momentarily doubles over in pain, clutching himself and crying in agony. The target is Stunned for 2 rounds and must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or suffer [[1d5]] levels of Fatigue.

description.value:
Impact Damage to Body (Severity 5)

A solid blow to the chest pulverises the target's innards, and he momentarily doubles over in pain, clutching himself and crying in agony. The target is Stunned for 2 rounds and must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or suffer [[1d5]] levels of Fatigue.
